summary: Both REQ-11 and REQ-12 are substantially implemented. The products data has been expanded with multiple products per category, and a CategoryShowcaseSection has been added to the homepage. Minor gaps exist around the 'Tufted Mirror Rug' category count requirement and the CTA button placement (bottom-left vs. centered), but overall coverage is strong.
